00018 #ifndef WEIGHTED_SUMS_SCORE_HEADER_FILE

00021 #include <SitesScoreBase.H>

00023 namespace SimSite3D{
00024 
00026 class WeightedSumsScore : public SitesScoreBase{
00027 public:
00028   typedef std::less<my_float_t>         score_cmp; 
00029 
00031   WeightedSumsScore() 
00032   { 
00033     init(); 
00034   }

00037   virtual ~WeightedSumsScore() 
00038   { 
00039     clear_mem();

00053   //template< class align_T_iterator > my_float_t 
00054   my_float_t
00055   score(const ModelSitemap &model, const DbaseSitemap &dbase,
00056         rigid_align_t *scores)
00057         //align_T_iterator scores)
00058   {
00059     init_storage(model);
00060     std::vector<my_float_t> &terms = scores->terms;
00061     terms.resize(10);
00062     std::fill(terms.begin(), terms.end(), 0.0);
00063   
00064     my_float_t &closest_polar_sum = terms[0];
00065     my_float_t &polar_mismatch_sum = terms[1];
00066     my_float_t &AA_DD_sum = terms[2];
00067     my_float_t &doneptor_sum = terms[3];
00068     my_float_t &phobic_count = terms[4];
00069     my_float_t &unsat_polar_count = terms[5];
00070   
00071     my_float_t &best_polar_sum = terms[6];
00072     my_float_t &best_AA_DD_sum = terms[7];
00073     my_float_t &best_doneptor_sum = terms[8];
00074     my_float_t &best_polar_mismatch_sum = terms[9];
00075   
00076     std::fill(scores->match_print.begin(), scores->match_print.end(), false);
00077     std::vector<bool>::iterator M_hit = scores->match_print.begin();
00078     std::fill(A_closest_pts, A_closest_pts + 4*A_max_num_pts, my_float_max);
00079   
00080     const HbondPoints& M_hbonds = model.hbond_points();
00081     const HphobPoints& M_hphobs = model.hphob_points();
00082     const HbondPoints& S_hbonds = dbase.hbond_points();
00083     const HphobPoints& S_hphobs = dbase.hphob_points();
00084   
00085     my_float_t *cp = A_closest_pts;
00086     my_float_t *cp_dist = A_pt_dists;
00087   
00088     // Hbond counts
00089     for(hbond_fit_pt_vci M = M_hbonds.fit_pts_beg(); M < M_hbonds.fit_pts_end();
00090         ++M, ++M_hit, cp += 3, ++cp_dist){
00091   
00092       hbond_fit_pt_vec::float_const_iter_map close_S_hbonds;
00093       S_hbonds.close_fit_pts(M->pos, A_max_dist, &close_S_hbonds);
00094       hbond_fit_pt_vci best_pt = S_hbonds.fit_pts_end();
00095       hbond_fit_pt_vci closest_pt = S_hbonds.fit_pts_end();
00096       // Let the first idx (0) be for complementary AA or DD matches 
00097       // and the second idx (1) be for complementary doneptor - polar matches
00098       // and the third idx (2) be for acceptor-donor matches
00099       my_float_t best_scores[] = {-2.0, -2.0, -2.0};
00100       my_float_t closest_scores[] = {-2.0, -2.0, -2.0};
00101       my_float_t shortest_sq_dists[] = 
00102         {A_max_dist*A_max_dist, A_max_dist*A_max_dist, A_max_dist*A_max_dist};
00103       hbond_fit_pt_vec::float_const_iter_map::const_iterator close_pt;
00104       for(close_pt = close_S_hbonds.begin(); close_pt != close_S_hbonds.end();
00105           ++close_pt){
00106         my_float_t dotprod = dot(M->dir, close_pt->second->dir);
00107         my_float_t sq_dist = dist_squared(M->pos, close_pt->second->pos);
00108   
00109         int idx = 0;
00110         // Acceptor-donor mismatch
00111         if((close_pt->second->act_type == DONOR && M->act_type == ACCEPTOR) ||
00112            (close_pt->second->act_type == ACCEPTOR && M->act_type == DONOR))
00113           idx = 2;
00114         // Doneptor match
00115         else if(close_pt->second->act_type == DONEPTOR || 
00116                 M->act_type == DONEPTOR)
00117           idx = 1;
00118    
00119         if(dotprod > best_scores[idx]) best_scores[idx] = dotprod;
00120         if(sq_dist < shortest_sq_dists[idx]){
00121           shortest_sq_dists[idx] = sq_dist;
00122           closest_scores[idx] = dotprod;
00123           if(idx < 2) closest_pt = close_pt->second;
00124         }
00125       }
00126   
00127       // Best scoring match in the neighborhood
00128       if(best_scores[0] > 0.0 || best_scores[1] > 0.0){
00129         if(best_scores[0] > best_scores[1]){
00130           best_AA_DD_sum += best_scores[0];
00131           best_polar_sum += best_scores[0];
00132         }else{
00133           best_doneptor_sum += best_scores[1];
00134           best_polar_sum += best_scores[1];
00135         }
00136       }else if(best_scores[2] > 0.0) best_polar_mismatch_sum += best_scores[2];
00137       else ++unsat_polar_count;
00138            
00139       // Closest polar point to neighborhood center
00140       if(shortest_sq_dists[0] < A_max_dist*A_max_dist || 
00141          shortest_sq_dists[1] < A_max_dist*A_max_dist){
00142         if(shortest_sq_dists[0] < shortest_sq_dists[1]){
00143           if(closest_scores[0] > 0.0){
00144             AA_DD_sum += closest_scores[0]; 
00145             closest_polar_sum += closest_scores[0]; 
00146             *M_hit = true;
00147             std::copy(closest_pt->pos, closest_pt->pos + 3, cp);
00148             *cp_dist = shortest_sq_dists[0];
00149           }
00150         }else if(closest_scores[1] > 0.0){
00151           doneptor_sum += closest_scores[1]; 
00152           closest_polar_sum += closest_scores[1]; 
00153           *M_hit = true;
00154           std::copy(closest_pt->pos, closest_pt->pos + 3, cp);
00155           *cp_dist = shortest_sq_dists[1];
00156         }
00157       }else if(shortest_sq_dists[2] < A_max_dist*A_max_dist &&
00158                closest_scores[2] > 0.0) polar_mismatch_sum += closest_scores[2];
00159     }
00160   
00161     // Hydrophobic Counts
00162     int my_cnt = 0;
00163     for(hphob_point_lci H = M_hphobs.begin(); H != M_hphobs.end();
00164         ++H, ++M_hit, cp += 3, ++cp_dist){
00165       my_float_t d_phil, d_phob;
00166       S_hbonds.closest_fit_pt(H->pos, &d_phil);
00167       hphob_point_lci hphob_cp = S_hphobs.closest_point(H->pos, &d_phob);
00168   
00169       if(d_phob <= A_max_dist && d_phob <= d_phil){
00170         ++phobic_count;
00171         *M_hit = true;
00172         std::copy(hphob_cp->pos, hphob_cp->pos + 3, cp);
00173         *cp_dist = d_phob;
00174       }
00175       ++ my_cnt;
00176     }
00177   
00178     // Scale the terms if desired
00179     if(scale_terms()){
00180       std::vector<my_float_t>::const_iterator max_val =
00181         model.get_max_feature_vals().begin();
00182       std::vector<my_float_t>::iterator t;
00183       for(t = terms.begin(); t < terms.end(); ++t, ++max_val) *t /= *max_val;
00184   
00185       return SCALED_CONSTANT_TERM +
00186              SCALED_POLAR_SUM_W * closest_polar_sum +
00187              SCALED_POLAR_MISMATCH_W * polar_mismatch_sum +
00188              SCALED_DD_OR_AA_POLAR_SUM_W * AA_DD_sum +
00189              SCALED_DONEPTOR_POLAR_SUM_W * doneptor_sum +
00190              SCALED_HPHOBIC_COUNT_W * phobic_count +
00191              SCALED_UNSAT_POLAR_W * unsat_polar_count;
00192     }else{
00193       return CONSTANT_TERM +
00194              POLAR_SUM_W * closest_polar_sum +
00195              POLAR_MISMATCH_W * polar_mismatch_sum +
00196              DD_OR_AA_POLAR_SUM_W * AA_DD_sum +
00197              DONEPTOR_POLAR_SUM_W * doneptor_sum +
00198              HPHOBIC_COUNT_W * phobic_count +
00199              UNSAT_POLAR_W * unsat_polar_count;
00200     }
00201   }
00202 
00203   virtual my_float_t
00204   correspondences(const ModelSitemap &model, my_float_t **Q_pts_ptr, 
00205                   my_float_t **D_pts_ptr, size_t *npts);
00206   
00207   virtual void 
00208   polar_correspondences(const ModelSitemap &model,
00209                         std::vector<const my_float_t *> *q_pts,
00210                         std::vector<const my_float_t *> *corr_pts) const;

00214                         my_float_t **closest_pts_ptr, size_t *npts)
00215   {
00216     std::cerr << "weightedsumsscore polar correspondences are NULL\n";

00223                         m_cap_iters_vci cap_iters_beg,

00225                         std::vector<const my_float_t *> *q_pts,

00234   uses_surface_mesh()

00238   uses_hbond_surfaces() 
00239   { return false; }

00243   virtual inline const my_float_t*
00244   closest_points() const
00245   { return A_closest_pts; }
00246 
00247   virtual inline int
00248   num_close_points() const
00249   { return A_max_num_pts; }

00251 private:
00252   void
00253   init()
00254   {
00255     A_closest_pts = 0;
00256     A_pt_dists = 0;
00257     A_max_num_pts = 0;
00258   }
00259 
00260   void
00261   clear_mem()
00262   {
00263     if(A_closest_pts) delete [](A_closest_pts);
00264   }
00265 
00266   void
00267   init_storage(const ModelSitemap &model);
00268 
00269   my_float_t *A_closest_pts;
00270   my_float_t *A_pt_dists;
00271   size_t A_max_num_pts;
00272 
00273   static const std::string A_fname;             
00274   static const my_float_t POLAR_SUM_W;          
00275   static const my_float_t DD_OR_AA_POLAR_SUM_W; 
00276   static const my_float_t DONEPTOR_POLAR_SUM_W; 
00277   static const my_float_t HPHOBIC_COUNT_W;      
00278   static const my_float_t POLAR_MISMATCH_W;     
00279   static const my_float_t UNSAT_POLAR_W;        
00280   static const my_float_t CONSTANT_TERM;        
00281   static const my_float_t SCALED_POLAR_SUM_W;          
00282   static const my_float_t SCALED_DD_OR_AA_POLAR_SUM_W; 
00283   static const my_float_t SCALED_DONEPTOR_POLAR_SUM_W; 
00284   static const my_float_t SCALED_HPHOBIC_COUNT_W;      
00285   static const my_float_t SCALED_POLAR_MISMATCH_W;     
00286   static const my_float_t SCALED_UNSAT_POLAR_W;        
00287   static const my_float_t SCALED_CONSTANT_TERM;        
00288   static const my_float_t A_max_dist;           
00289 };
